onboarding.welcome: Welcome to Afflyt Pro Command Center
onboarding.completeSetup: Configure the system in 3 simple steps and start monetizing
onboarding.whyImportantDesc: Each step unlocks critical features: Channels enable publishing, Credentials activate real-time Keepa data access, and Automations manage everything automatically 24/7. Once configuration is complete, the system will immediately start generating value.

requirements.title: What you need:

createBot.title: Create Telegram Bot
createBot.subtitle: Follow these steps to get the bot token
createBot.step3: Choose a name and username for the bot
createBot.step3Hint: The username must end with "bot" (e.g. MyAffiliateBot)
createBot.step4: Copy the API token you receive

connectChannel.title: Connect Channel/Group
connectChannel.subtitle: Configure where the bot will publish deals
connectChannel.step1: Add the bot to your channel/group
connectChannel.step1Hint: Go to channel settings → Administrators → Add administrator → Search @{bot}
connectChannel.step3HintPrivate: For private channels: use the numeric ID (e.g. -1001234567890)
connectChannel.channelNameHint: A descriptive name to easily recognize the channel
connectChannel.ensureAdmin: Make sure the bot is an administrator with publishing permissions

testConfig.title: Test Configuration
testConfig.subtitle: Let's verify everything works correctly
testConfig.testMessageDesc: We'll send a test message to your channel
testConfig.successHint: If you received the message, the configuration is correct. You can proceed!
testConfig.successMessage: From now on, Afflyt will automatically publish the best deals to your Telegram channel according to the rules you configure.
